Package com.example.game

Class controller

java.lang.Object
com.example.game.spawn
com.example.game.controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameScene
public class controller extends spawn
controller.java responsible for passing cells to destination, receive user input and process it accordingly

    • moveHorizontally

      private void moveHorizontally(int i, int j, int des, int sign)
      Responsible passing two cells and add them together. Playing sound effect when two cells are added together. Controls horizontal moves. Also controls scoring system.
      Parameters:
      i - x axis
      j - y axis
      des - destination
      sign - sign

    • moveVertically

      private void moveVertically(int i, int j, int des, int sign)
      Responsible passing two cells and add them together. Playing sound effect when two cells are added together. Controls verticals moves. Also controls scoring system.
      Parameters:
      i - x axis
      j - y axis
      des - destination
      sign - sign
